1583254800.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1583254800.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1583258400.title: Bloomberg Money Undercover
1583258400.descr: Bloomberg Money Undercover looks at the world of private debt, equity and real estate. Lisa Abramowicz meets investors who are pouring money into the private market at an unprecedented level.

1583262000.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1583262000.descr: This fast-paced programme is the quintessential market close show leading up to the final minutes and seconds before the closing bell on Wall Street with the latest news, data and expert analysis.

1583269200.title: What'd You Miss?
1583269200.descr: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets program, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a counterintuitive, highly intelligent look at the markets that misses absolutely nothing.

1583296200.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East live from Dubai, connects Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.
